languages.text: "Какой неожиданный совет. Поверить не могу, что слышу его из твоих уст!"
"What an unexpected bit of advice. I can't believe it's coming out of your mouth!"
languages.original_text: "Какой неожиданный совет. Поверить не могу, что слышу его из твоих уст!"

traits.locale_text: "What an unexpected bit of advice. I can't believe I'm hearing it out of your mouth!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "What an unexpected bit of advice. I can't believe I'm hearing it out of your mouth!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "What an unexpected bit of advice. I can't believe it's coming out of your mouth!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "What an unexpected bit of advice. I can't believe it's coming out of your mouth!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "What an unexpected bit of advice. I can't believe it's coming out of your mouth!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Un consejo inesperado. ¡No me creo que lo estés diciendo tú!».
languages.original_text: "What an unexpected bit of advice. I can't believe it's coming out of your mouth!"

traits.locale_text: «Un consejo inesperado. ¡No me creo que lo estés diciendo tú!».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「思いがけないアドバイスだ。あなたの口から出てきただなんて、信じられない！」
languages.original_text: "What an unexpected bit of advice. I can't believe it's coming out of your mouth!"

traits.locale_text: 「思いがけないアドバイスだ。あなたの口から出てきただなんて、信じられない！」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “这还真是个出乎意料的建议，真不敢相信这居然是从你嘴里说出来的！”
languages.original_text: "What an unexpected bit of advice. I can't believe it's coming out of your mouth!"

traits.locale_text: “这还真是个出乎意料的建议，真不敢相信这居然是从你嘴里说出来的！”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Was für ein unerwarteter Ratschlag. Ich kann gar nicht glauben, dass er aus Eurem Mund kommt!"
languages.original_text: "What an unexpected bit of advice. I can't believe it's coming out of your mouth!"

traits.locale_text: "Was für ein unerwarteter Ratschlag. Ich kann gar nicht glauben, dass er aus Eurem Mund kommt!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « En voilà, une suggestion inattendue. Je n'arrive pas à croire qu'elle sorte de votre bouche ! »
languages.original_text: "What an unexpected bit of advice. I can't believe it's coming out of your mouth!"

traits.locale_text: « En voilà, une suggestion inattendue. Je n'arrive pas à croire qu'elle sorte de votre bouche ! »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
